title: Manipur University Recruitment 2025 ----Apply for Research Associate Post
description: Manipur University has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Ph.D, M.Pharm, MVSc, M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the Manipur University Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
